content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As a US-based employee, you are required to participate in training related to understanding requirements under EPAM's Policy, and the law, related to Harassment, Discrimination, and Bullying.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you already participated in one of the previous live trainings on\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"October 12, 2017\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(70, 69, 71)\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", you may skip the replay and click “Next” to move to the certification section. If you have not already participated in one of these previous live trainings, you must review the training video in its entirety before moving forward.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Note:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(178, 39, 70)\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"if you are a supervisor, Account Manager, Delivery Manager, or hold a director/senior director level role, please do not review this training and instead click “Next” and select the bottom option to skip this training. Supervisors/Leaders will receive a separate module to complete\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://videoportal.epam.com/video/iframe.html?video=nR4gMAoD&resolution=1280x720#\",\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(0, 0, 0)\",\"font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"font-size\":\"medium\",\"font-style\":\"normal\",\"font-variant-ligatures\":\"normal\",\"font-variant-caps\":\"normal\",\"font-weight\":\"400\",\"letter-spacing\":\"normal\",\"orphans\":\"2\",\"text-align\":\"start\",\"text-indent\":\"0px\",\"text-transform\":\"none\",\"white-space\":\"normal\",\"widows\":\"2\",\"word-spacing\":\"0px\",\"-webkit-text-stroke-width\":\"0px\",\"text-decoration-style\":\"initial\",\"text-decoration-color\":\"initial\"}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
